title: @Riot, Curious as to Why Evelyn is not being looked at during this ASN Re-work

replies.body:
Yeah and it's also weird that her stealth is the only stealth that is classified as camo.

We're separating stealth into camo and invis, btw the only camo is eve.
Eve is the only Camouflage user at present, she won't be the only one after the pre-season though.

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1aNBAY5N,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-10-11T03:04:15.489+0000)
>
> Eve is the only Camouflage user at present, she won't be the only one after the pre-season though.

CAMO WARWICK CONFIRMED

> [{quoted}](name=TBakes,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1aNBAY5N,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2016-10-11T03:40:29.231+0000)
>
> CAMO WARWICK CONFIRMED

I pray no. CertainlyT, the father of aggravations such as Yasuo and Kalista, and who brought you game breaking on launch champions Zyra, Darius, and Thresh, as well as who reworked Mordekaiser into an ADC and reworked Graves and Caitlyn should NOT ever be considering making a stealth champion. Hell do insane shit like suppress you from stealth with a %HP lifesteal 4 hit passive on every ability. The balance team needs to nerf Warwick before he hits the PBE and remove like 2 passives before he'll be remotely acceptable with stealth.
do i have to think of some1 like rengar with camoflage?
I'd like to see WW with a camo mecanic, but i think its Rengar the best candidate(Assassin update).

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1aNBAY5N,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-10-11T03:04:15.489+0000)
>
> Eve is the only Camouflage user at present, she won't be the only one after the pre-season though.

Could you make evelynn Q a toggle ability so it constantly activates when the Q key is held down.  My keyboards Q key is actually worn out from clicking Q so much

god i hope u are trolling with the pink ward changes  i may not want to play league anymore. DDoes Riot realize that ppl think eve is already broken and without pinks giving vision of her she will be pick or ban and u want to make another one. Makes me sad. Those 2 champs will be banned for ever. Stealth unless in limited use like rengar khazix is far to op  not to have a way to counter it. I also see the flip side that buying a 75 gold item complety  shut them down ( that sux for ppl that like those chaps). So what will be done to counter balance the perma- stealths if the pink changes go through?  While that 75 gold pink is the downfall of perma-stealths it is also most of the counterplay against them. Thoughts?

She's the only person Pinks would reveal actually, she isn't getting buffed in any way by the change, just other stealth users.


Rengar might as well be a new Camo user though, but it isn't known for a fact who's getting the Camo, just that someone else is.
So,  teemo, but who else?

> [{quoted}](name=crowcawer,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1aNBAY5N,comment-id=000100000003,timestamp=2016-10-11T04:46:34.140+0000)
>
> So,  teemo, but who else?

Teemo is not getting camo since his kit wouldn't work, a rioter said that but I don't have the sauce atm sorry :/
Wait, so not even teemo's passive is camouflage? Isn't camouflage supposed to be long term stealth?

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1aNBAY5N,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-10-11T03:04:15.489+0000)
>
> Eve is the only Camouflage user at present, she won't be the only one after the pre-season though.

Talon? You said he'll use terrain to his advantage, which is what camouflage is, and then the entire emphasis on roaming... it makes sense.

Concerning Twitch: will he be Invisibility or Camouflage? He currently utilizes the strengths of both and isn't as easily categorized as most other "stealth" users right now. Also, Can we expect some compensation buffs considering he **will** lose part of his current kit whichever option is taken; or is his stealth just being weakened to match that of other stealth users?

what if the initial 3 seconds if his stealth are invisibility and then he moves over to being camouflaged.

it'd save twitch for giving twitch the window to escape, outplay the enemy while also giving him counterplay with pink wards based on how much AOE burst damage he brings 

if twitch stays classified as invisibility i guarantee that he's going to get nerfed hard

He definitely isn't staying the same. Riot have even said he wouldn't work in his current state with the new changes. This is probably what they'll do or maybe an initial burst of movement speed. I hope it's something, cause otherwise it'll just be the second massive nerf for twitch in the past couple months...
Would it be too much to ask who else apart from Eve is being classified as Camo?
That sounds kind of odd to hear because that was always just an evelynn thing.

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1aNBAY5N,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-10-11T03:04:15.489+0000)
>
> Eve is the only Camouflage user at present, she won't be the only one after the pre-season though.

Please don't make shaco work around that, I can't see that feeling good as a current shaco main.

1. Like make the stealth on Q be tied to a passive on R, so it gates is early oppressive ganks before 6.

2. W placement range increase (old value from before TT wall collision bug fix patch) a bit back up.

3. E fix the casting animation to get the shiv out fast so it isn't cancel'd by fog interaction like current

4. Clean up the code on his boxes so they don't insta die late game.

I like this champ how he is... plz don't kill another champ I main.


You already took from me...
AP Yi...
&
AP Trist...
&
Ap Yorick
&
Ap Trynd

inba Diana will get new passive: shrouded in moonlight. Her abilities would proc temporary invisibility/camouflage effect on her. Every 3rd Q, Everytime she proc second shield from W, when she hits enemy champion with E and when she manage to hit same target with R in short durtaion!

Her current passive could be attached to E so it wouldn't be "put 1 point and then forget about that ability until late game"

Maybe this would make her very strong and viable jungler

Suddenly I'm getting positive vibes and good memories of Night Elves from Warcraft 3 and their invis that worked during night :>
If you are wandering why she's not being given big changes during the assassin rework, its because shes high on the list for a VGU update so shes only getting some small ones.
Yep, Eve's a fairly likely candidate for a full VGU next year.
I'm sorry what does VGU mean? Like her kit?
Visual and Gameplay Update. Both her art and her kit.
Why a full VGU? She works well and her gameplay very much matches her theme.

> [{quoted}](name=VenomStrike31,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1aNBAY5N,comment-id=000200000001,timestamp=2016-10-11T06:36:53.281+0000)
>
> Why a full VGU? She works well and her gameplay very much matches her theme.

I'm with you on her not changing she's fine as is. All she needs is a visual update in game... and a skin...
She got a welcoming buff a few patches ago, which has greatly helped her, but she is old and her kit could use an update. I for one am waiting eagerly for it.
Agree. Visually, she needs an update but gameplay-wise she's in a very healthy spot imo

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1aNBAY5N,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-10-11T03:03:25.116+0000)
>
> Yep, Eve's a fairly likely candidate for a full VGU next year.

Meddler dont let this be another bait
Pls my heart cant handle another one
It would be devastating for you guys to ignore her during the assassin update then pass over her for a VGU in favor of someone else.
Kinda like what you did with Urgot and the marksman update
They'll probably pass her over for urgot and galio first anyway.

> [{quoted}](name=TeCoolMage,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1aNBAY5N,comment-id=0002000000020000,timestamp=2016-10-11T12:26:25.171+0000)
>
> They'll probably pass her over for urgot and galio first anyway.

Galio is already confirmed. Warwick is coming during or shortly after Preseason. Once his team goes dormat, they will get a new champion to do a VGU. Considering that Evelynn and Urgot are extremely high on their list, and given their vocal discussions about the two, one of them will likely be chosen after Warwick. Even then, once Galio is done in like March or April, that will open up the slot for the other one to get their VGU, meaning it is a very real possibility to get both Urgot and Evelynn next year.
Because they couldn't find her.
She is being affected by stealth changes, even though she still is affected by pinks (other small changes might happen to stealth).
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} {{item:3632}}

She's not an actual assassin and if her gameplay is tied to assassin, she will never be healthy. 

She's more of a diver/flanker type bruiser/fighter than an assassin.

C'mon, Riot's stated this several times.
